paragraphs.text:
%md
I see a negative relation or correlation between age and absences of these employees

%md
* Define a function to calculate the parameters of the regression line. No methods allowed!

%md
Negative value of A indicates a negative correlation between the two series of values.

%md
* Define a function to calculate the covariance and the correlation (you can use the methods you defined for the standard deviation)
* Calculate the covariance and the correlation. Compare them.

%md
The covariance is in another units from the values from the regression. The value is mathematically strong, but it is difficult to say something wiht it about the regression. 
On the other hand, the regression has no units and it can be compared between different regressions. It also give us information about the relation between x and y.

%md
* Interprete the results and give some conclusions. Can I say that the age is an indicator of absentisme?

The correlation is also negative, -0.839. With this values you can afirm that the relation between Age and absentism has a moderately strong negative relationship.

%md
* Calculate the covariance and the correlation. What do you think?
* Draw the dispersion diagram. Any comments?
* Calculate the regression line. What do you think?
* Can you give some conclusions?

%md
Both series of values have a positive correlation.

%md
* Draw the dispersion diagram. Any comments?
